articles.title: Team SA lands 2 gold medals in Tokyo as long-jumper Mahlangu breaks world record - News24
articles.description: South Africa landed two gold medals at the Tokyo Paralympics on Saturday through long-jumper Ntando Mahlangu and 400m runner Anrune Weyers.
articles.content:
South Africa landed two gold medals at the Tokyo Paralympics on Saturday through long-jumper Ntando Mahlangu and 400m runner Anrune Weyers. 
Mahlangu, who is 19-years-old, set a new world record.
